Dog Run Expressions

Chantelle is building a dog run for her dog, Otis.

The length of the run will be three times longer than the width of the run.

Write different expressions to represent the length of the run based on the width of the run.

Width of Dog Run (ft.) Length of Dog Run (ft.) Expression 1 Length of Dog Run (ft.) Expression 2 Length of Dog Run (ft.) Expression 3
\(4\)
\(6\)
\(w\)
